briefTitle: Study Evaluating the Impact of a 13-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine on Nasopharyngeal Colonization
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Randomized, Active-Controlled, Double-blind Trial Evaluating the Impact of a 13-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine on Nasopharyngeal Colonization With Vaccine Serotypes of Streptococcus Pneumoniae in Healthy Infants in Israel.
summary: This study is designed to assess the impact of 13-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine (13vPnC) on nasopharyngeal colonization with Streptococcus pneumoniae in healthy infants.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With a New Acquisition of Serotype 6A' (6A + 6C) or 19A Combined 1 Month After the Infant Series to 24 Months of Age
